You examine the pool of slime and upon closer inspection you find that it leads to

a cave system flooded by slime

leading in an unknown direction.
You could try to dive in, hold your breath and swim towards the end?
On closer inspection the glinting object is revealed to be a key.
It looks very old and seems to be made of iron. It has some slime on it.

3.log_text:
a tight cave

leading south out of the grotto.
examine_text:
You examine

the cave entrance

, it looks big enough for you to fit inside. The cave leads south.
On closer inspection the object is revealed to be a rusty sword.
It looks quite old. It has some slime on it.
On closer inspection the object is revealed to be an old bow.
It looks aged. It has deteriorated in quality due to the passage of time.
You look closer at the ring on the skeleton finger.
It is made of a green mineral and decorated with pearls. The craftmanship is of remarkable quality.
You look closer at the rusty helmet on the skeleton.
It is made of metal. It is badly dented and covered in rust.
On closer inspection the object is revealed to be a rusty old shield.
It seems to be in a bad condition. It is worn out by battle and by age. It is covered in rust and has several holes.
On closer inspection the object is revealed to be a bottle of antidote.
A medical drink that cures poisoning.
On closer inspection the object is revealed to be a bottle of health potion.
A remarkable magick drink with healing properties.
